app.startup.success: Started successfully and is running in the background.
hotkey.dialog.conflict_message:
Hotkey {hotkey} is already in use by another application.

Forcing it may cause it to stop working in the other application or fail to work in PasteMD.

Do you still want to force use it?
hotkey.dialog.heading: Configure global hotkey
hotkey.dialog.record_first: Please record a new hotkey first.
hotkey.dialog.title: Set Hotkey
hotkey.recorder.error.no_modifier: The hotkey must include at least one modifier key (Ctrl, Shift, Alt).
hotkey.recorder.error.no_normal_key: The hotkey must include at least one regular key.
hotkey.recorder.error.shift_only_long:
Shift cannot be the only modifier because it conflicts with input.
Include Ctrl, Alt, or the Win key.
hotkey.recorder.error.shift_only_short: Shift cannot be the only modifier; it conflicts with system input.
hotkey.recorder.error.system_reserved_lo:
{combo} is a system reserved shortcut.
pynput cannot override its default behavior and will conflict.

Try uncommon combinations such as:
• Ctrl+Shift+V
• Ctrl+Alt+V
• Ctrl+Shift+B (default)
hotkey.recorder.error.system_reserved_sh: System reserved hotkey {combo} cannot be used.
hotkey.runner.binding_failed: Failed to bind the hotkey. Reverted to Ctrl+Shift+B.
hotkey.runner.invalid_config:
Configured hotkey is invalid and has been reset to Ctrl+Shift+B.

Error: {error}
hotkey.runner.serious_error: Unable to bind any hotkey. Please check your system settings.
settings.dialog.title: PasteMD Settings
settings.extensions.window_pattern_hint: Optional regex patterns to match browser window titles (one per line)
settings.extensions.description: Note: HTML paste is suitable for Notion, Yuque etc.; Markdown paste is suitable for Obsidian and other native MD editors; File paste is suitable for apps that accept attachments.
settings.extensions.reserved_app_error: Application {app} is reserved (Word/WPS/Excel) and cannot be added.
settings.extensions.app_exists: Application {app} is already in the list.
settings.extensions.app_conflict_error: Application {app} is already configured in '{workflow}'. Add it here anyway to use different window name patterns?
settings.extensions.config_conflict_warn:
Detected cross-workflow application conflicts in configuration:

{conflicts}

Please fix the configuration. An application can only be configured for one paste mode.
Conflicting applications may cause unpredictable paste behavior.
settings.extensions.unsupported_platform: This feature is not supported on the current platform.
settings.extensions.win32_import_error: Failed to import Windows API module.
settings.permissions.intro: PasteMD needs the following permissions on macOS. Please review and grant them if needed.
settings.permissions.accessibility.title: Accessibility
settings.permissions.accessibility.desc: Required to simulate Cmd+V paste and assistive actions.
settings.permissions.screen_recording.de: Required to read WPS window titles (macOS classifies window title access under Screen Recording).
settings.permissions.input_monitoring.de: Required for global hotkey listening. macOS may require enabling PasteMD under Input Monitoring.
settings.permissions.automation.title: Automation
settings.permissions.automation.desc: Required to control Word/Excel and insert content.
settings.permissions.add_hint: If PasteMD is missing in the System Settings list, click the '+' below the list to add it.
settings.general.auto_open: Auto open file when no app detected
settings.general.move_cursor: Move cursor to end after insertion
settings.conversion.md_indent: Markdown: disable special first-paragraph style after headings
settings.conversion.html_indent: HTML: disable special first-paragraph style after headings
settings.conversion.pandoc_filters: Pandoc Filters, apply more complex conversions
settings.conversion.pandoc_request_heade: One header per line, format: Name: Value. Useful for 403 image fetches (User-Agent/Referer).

tray.status.move_cursor_off: Caret no longer moves after insert

placer.win32_word.insert_failed:
Word insertion failed: {error}
Please check if Word is running properly
placer.win32_wps.insert_failed:
WPS insertion failed: {error}
Please check if WPS is running properly, background processes will be cleaned if necessary
placer.win32_excel.insert_failed:
Excel insertion failed: {error}
Please check if Excel is running properly
placer.win32_wps_excel.insert_failed:
WPS Spreadsheet insertion failed: {error}
Please check if WPS Spreadsheet is running properly, background processes will be cleaned if necessary
placer.macos_word.insert_failed:
Word insertion failed: {error}

Please check:
1. Is Word open with a document?
2. System Preferences → Privacy → Automation → Allow PasteMD to control Word
3. Does Word have 'Full Disk Access' permission?
placer.macos_excel.insert_failed:
Excel insertion failed: {error}

Please check:
1. Is Excel open with a workbook?
2. System Preferences → Privacy → Automation → Allow PasteMD to control Excel
3. Does Excel have 'Full Disk Access' permission?
placer.macos_wps.not_supported:
macOS WPS insertion is not available in this mode.

Notes:
- WPS on macOS uses clipboard rich-text paste (HTML/RTF) and may require Accessibility/Automation permissions.
placer.macos_wps_excel.not_supported: WPS Spreadsheet insertion is only supported on macOS
placer.macos_wps_excel.insert_failed:
WPS Spreadsheet paste failed: {error}

Please check:
1. Is WPS Spreadsheet frontmost with a target cell selected?
2. System Settings → Privacy & Security → Accessibility: allow PasteMD
3. If it still fails, try disabling keep_format (fallback to plain-text paste)
